SELECT lec.lec_seq , lec.lec_nm , ui.loginID , ui.name , ui.user_email , lec.rm_seq , cntsel.cnt , room.rm_name , date_format(lec.lec_st, '%Y-%m-%d') as lec_st , date_format(lec.lec_ed, '%Y-%m-%d') as lec_ed FROM tb_lecture AS lec LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo AS ui ON lec.user_id = ui.loginID, ( SELECT lec_seq , count(*) as cnt FROM tb_request_list GROUP BY lec_seq ) cntsel,
( SELECT rm_seq , rm_name FROM tb_room ) room WHERE lec.lec_seq = cntsel.lec_seq AND lec.rm_seq = room.rm_seq
SELECT ui.loginID , ui.name , ui.user_email , uc.lec_yon FROM tb_userinfo AS ui LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_request_list AS uc ON ui.loginID = uc.user_id WHERE uc.lec_seq = #{lec_seq};

SELECT lec.lec_seq , lec.lec_nm , lec.lec_gl , lec.lec_pl , lec.lec_contents , ui.loginID , ui.name , ui.user_email , date_format(lec.lec_enr, '%Y. %m. %d') as lec_enr , date_format(lec.lec_st, '%Y. %m. %d') as lec_st , date_format(lec.lec_ed, '%Y. %m. %d') as lec_ed FROM tb_lecture AS lec LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_userinfo AS ui ON lec.user_id = ui.loginID ORDER BY lec.lec_seq;
